name: 3 Get tweets of users (v1.1)
description:
Note. Due to changed access restrictions, access via v1.1. is no longer possible. Use v2 instead. For more information: https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/twitter-api/getting-started/about-twitter-api#item0 This preset fetches tweets of users. Add the numeric user IDs as nodes (e.g. "865971338"). You can retrieve the IDs with the preset "2 Get information about users". Alternatively, add the screen_name (e.g. "digicademy") and change the parameter "user_id" to "screen_name".

**Login Process**

For standard access with v1 you can login via the "Login to Twitter" button. After that, access tokens are created and you can start fetching data.

**Get the tweets**

This preset gives you back the 200 most recent tweets of the user. In case you want to fetch more, change the count-parameter or increase the maximum pages. The API returns up to 3200 tweets.

You can skip retweets of a user by setting the parameter include_rts to false. Anyway, the count parameter still relates to the total number of tweets, including native retweets.

If you want to change the parameters, take a look at the documentation https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/twitter-api/v1/tweets/timelines/api-reference/get-statuses-user_timeline .

**Differences between v1.1 & v2**


Please remind that Twitter provides different API versions (https://developer.twitter.com/en/products/twitter-api). Facepager presets are available for API version 1 (v1) and API version 2 (v2). Each version comes with different access levels and limits. In the corresponding presets you will find information about how to work with API version 2.
